column1: Volume 1 Natality Table 4.2 Trends in live births and live birth rates (per 1 000 population) by month of live birth: Japan
Note: 1) The ratios for each month have been annualized. Please refer to (e-Stat) commentary on terms and ratios in “Commentary on the ratios” for the method of calculation.
Moreover，the population used as the denominator represents the population at the beginning of each month from 1970 onwards and the yearly population as of October 1 for the years until 1965.
2) The total number for 1947 includes four entries withunspecified months.

3）The figures do not correspond to those in the report before 2017 because recalculations were done due to omissions in reporting (released on March 29，2019) for 2004，2006 and 2009-2017 from prefectures.
